/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of white and beige, stand tall and proud, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On either side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings and the cityscape.
